definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: But my letter to you is worth to be written there.
sentences.chinese: 不過我給你的信值得寫在五線譜裏呢。

sentences.english: He is utterly ignorant of staff [stave].
If I were a musician, I would write a letter on staff to you.
sentences.chinese: 如果我是音樂家，就用五線譜給你寫信。

sentences.english: A bar line is a vertical line through the staff or system to mark a metrical division, corresponding to the time signature.
sentences.chinese: 小節線是與五線譜或譜表垂直的豎線，與拍號相對應。

sentences.english: Has it occurred to you that I have written my letter on a five-line staff?
sentences.chinese: 做夢也想不到我把信寫到五線譜上吧？

definition: music notation in which the notes Do, Re, Mi, Fa, Sol, La and Si are represented by numerals 1 to 7
courseware (abbr. for 課程軟件|课程软件[ke4 cheng2 ruan3 jian4])
music/rhyme and rhythm/initial, 音[yin1], and final and tone, 韻|韵[yun4], of a Chinese character/phoneme
see 頓挫抑揚|顿挫抑扬[dun4 cuo4 yi4 yang2]
rhyming word ending a line of verse/rhyme
to learn/to acquire (some skill through practice)/acquisition
